* support batch export for sessions
* support 3d touch in session filter list
* support all screen orientations
* breakpoint supported: session filter > breakpoints
* improve 3d touch of records item
* GUI color refactor for records: widget & records list
* fix sniffer disconnecting immediately after starting with cellular network
* fix source ip disappeared in record list
* fix sniffer disconnected after device sleeping
* fix some http traffics losing with matched domains filled in filter
* fix file error after action extension sharing
* fix source app being frozen after "Open in Thor"
* crash fixes & performance improves

* add privacy policy
* improve pipeline performance
* improve ssl auto-detecting
* improve hex viewer
* unicode domains supported in session filter, packet filter and searching
* display decoded unicode domains directly in records
* update active filter without stopping it
* switch filter without stopping previous one
* add raw body entry in record detail 
* fix files have a invalid file name failing to export
* fix crash for widget
